languages.text: "А, шакаленок, не любишь быть в неведении? За столом этим славно сидеть лишь с одной стороны?"
"The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"
languages.original_text: "А, шакаленок, не любишь быть в неведении? За столом этим славно сидеть лишь с одной стороны?"

traits.locale_text: "The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"
"The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"
"The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"
"The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"

languages.text: “豺狼不喜欢被留在黑暗中，因为黑暗里的风景恐怕不怎么样，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"

traits.locale_text: “豺狼不喜欢被留在黑暗中，因为黑暗里的风景恐怕不怎么样，是吧？”

languages.text: « Alors comme ça, le chacal n'aime pas avancer dans le noir... La vue n'est pas aussi agréable depuis notre côté de la table, hein ? »
languages.original_text: "The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors comme ça, le chacal n'aime pas avancer dans le noir... La vue n'est pas aussi agréable depuis notre côté de la table, hein ? »

languages.text: «Al chacal no le gusta quedarse a oscuras. La vista desde nuestra perspectiva no es tan agradable, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"

traits.locale_text: «Al chacal no le gusta quedarse a oscuras. La vista desde nuestra perspectiva no es tan agradable, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「ジャッカルは闇の中に居続けるのを好まん。テーブルの向こうまで視界は開けてないのか？」
languages.original_text: "The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"

traits.locale_text: 「ジャッカルは闇の中に居続けるのを好まん。テーブルの向こうまで視界は開けてないのか？」

languages.text: "Der Schakal mag es nicht, wenn man ihn im Dunkeln lässt. Von dieser Seite des Tischs ist die Aussicht weniger hübsch, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Schakal mag es nicht, wenn man ihn im Dunkeln lässt. Von dieser Seite des Tischs ist die Aussicht weniger hübsch, nicht wahr?"

languages.original_text: "The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"

languages.text: "Çakal, karanlıkta kalmayı sevmez. Manzara bu taraftan pek de iyi değilmiş ha?"
languages.original_text: "The jackal does not like being kept in the dark. The view's not as nice from this side of the table, is it?"

traits.locale_text: "Çakal karanlıkta kalmayı sevmez. Bu taraftan manzara pek iyi değil, değil mi?"
